languages.text: "Планетарные губернаторы — сколько от них проблем... То мятеж допустят, то умрут не вовремя, то еще чего похуже вытворят. Я и не помню, когда в последний раз видел нормального правителя мира".

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."
languages.original_text: "Планетарные губернаторы — сколько от них проблем... То мятеж допустят, то умрут не вовремя, то еще чего похуже вытворят. Я и не помню, когда в последний раз видел нормального правителя мира".

traits.locale_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break loose, or they die at a bad time, or it's something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break loose, or they die at a bad time, or it's something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

"Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

languages.text: “那些行星总督，他们总是会惹麻烦……要么任由叛乱爆发，要么专挑不方便的时候死，要么惹出更糟糕的事情。我已经不记得上次见到合格的总督是多久以前的事情了。”
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: “那些行星总督，他们总是会惹麻烦……要么任由叛乱爆发，要么专挑不方便的时候死，要么惹出更糟糕的事情。我已经不记得上次见到合格的总督是多久以前的事情了。”

languages.text: «Los gobernadores planetarios siempre dan problemas... O permiten que se produzca una rebelión, o se mueren en el peor momento, o algo peor. No recuerdo la última vez que vi un líder planetario en condiciones».
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: «Los gobernadores planetarios siempre dan problemas... O permiten que se produzca una rebelión, o se mueren en el peor momento, o algo peor. No recuerdo la última vez que vi un líder planetario en condiciones».

languages.text: « Les gouverneurs planétaires... sont toujours source de problèmes. L'un laisse une rébellion se fomenter, un autre meurt au mauvais moment, quand ce n'est pas encore pire. Je ne me rappelle plus à quand remonte la dernière fois où j'ai rencontré un dirigeant digne de ce nom. »
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: « Les gouverneurs planétaires... sont toujours source de problèmes. L'un laisse une rébellion se fomenter, un autre meurt au mauvais moment, quand ce n'est pas encore pire. Je ne me rappelle plus à quand remonte la dernière fois où j'ai rencontré un dirigeant digne de ce nom. »

languages.text: 「惑星総督はいつも問題を起こします…反乱を起こさせるか、都合の悪い時に死ぬか、あるいはもっと悪いことが起きます。まともな惑星統治者を最後に見たのはいつだったか思い出せません」
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: 「惑星総督はいつも問題を起こします…反乱を起こさせるか、都合の悪い時に死ぬか、あるいはもっと悪いことが起きます。まともな惑星統治者を最後に見たのはいつだったか思い出せません」

languages.text: "Gezegen valileri... Hep sorun yaratırlar... İsyan çıkmasına izin verirler, olmadık zamanlarda ölürler, hatta çok daha fenalarını yaparlar. En son ne zaman düzgün bir gezegen hükümdarı gördüğümü hatırlayamıyorum bile."
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen valileri... Hep bir sorun yaratırlar... Ya bir isyanın çıkmasına izin verirler ya olmadık bir zamanda ölürler ya da çok daha fenasını yaparlar. En son ne zaman düzgün bir gezegen hükümdarı gördüğümü hatırlayamıyorum bile."

languages.text: "Planetengouverneure – die machen immer Probleme ... Entweder lassen sie zu, dass eine Rebellion losbricht, sterben zu einem ungünstigen Zeitpunkt oder Schlimmeres. Ich kann mich nicht daran erinnern, wann ich das letzte Mal einen anständigen Planetenherrscher gesehen habe."
languages.original_text: "Planetary governors — they always make problems... Either they let a rebellion break out, or they die at a bad time, or something worse. I can't remember the last time I saw a decent planetary ruler."

traits.locale_text: "Planetengouverneure – die machen immer Probleme ... Entweder lassen sie zu, dass eine Rebellion losbricht, sterben zu einem ungünstigen Zeitpunkt oder Schlimmeres. Ich kann mich nicht daran erinnern, wann ich das letzte Mal einen anständigen Planetenherrscher gesehen habe."
